metadata.title: Supreme X Detailing | Professional Auto Detailing Reno
metadata.description: As the leading car detailing company in the Reno/Sparks area, Supreme-X Auto Detail delivers unparalleled automotive care. Book your appointment today!

topBar.deal: Bundle & Save -- Get 50% Off Full Interior Detail When Selecting Any Ceramic Coating Package

hero.title: GIVE IT A PREMIUM TREATMENT TODAY!
hero.subtitle: As the leading car detailing company in the Reno/Sparks area, Supreme-X Auto Detail stands as the premier choice for vehicle owners seeking unparalleled automotive care. Our mission is to redefine vehicle appearance through meticulous detailing, ensuring every client experiences the pinnacle of excellence in car care services.
hero.description: Whether at our shop, your residence or job site, our skilled team of detailers delivers comprehensive car cleaning services with convenience and precision.

interiorDetailing.title: INTERIOR DETAILING
interiorDetailing.description: Interior detailing involves deep cleaning and sanitizing all surfaces, including seats, carpets, and dashboards, ensuring freshness.

exteriorDetailing.title: EXTERIOR DETAILING
exteriorDetailing.description: Exterior detailing includes washing, waxing, and polishing the vehicle's surface to restore shine and protection.

motorcyclesCleaning.title: MOTORCYCLES CLEANING
motorcyclesCleaning.description: Wash body and wheels, clean engine carefully, lubricate chain, avoid water on electrical components.

rvsBoats.title: RVS, BOATS
rvsBoats.description: RVs and boats require specialized cleaning to maintain their appearance and prevent damage from elements.

interiorServicesPage.heroTitle: Premium Interior Care for Your Vehicle
interiorServicesPage.introTitle: Meticulous Interior Detailing For A Fresh Ride
interiorServicesPage.introDescription: Our Standard Interior Auto Detail package is designed to restore and refresh your vehicle's interior, ensuring it looks and feels like new. This comprehensive service focuses on cleaning, sanitizing, and protecting all surfaces, providing a comfortable and inviting environment for you and your passengers.
interiorServicesPage.ctaText: Contact us today for a professional interior detailing service.

fullWipeDown.title: Full Wipe Down
fullWipeDown.description: Experience a thorough clean with our Full Wipe Down Service, eliminating dust and allergens effectively.

vacuumInterior.title: Vacuum Interior
vacuumInterior.description: Revitalize your vehicle with our Vacuum Interior Service, removing dust and debris for a fresh interior.

spotStainTreatment.title: Spot Stain Treatment
spotStainTreatment.description: Our Spot Stain Treatment Service effectively removes tough stains, restoring your surfaces to their original condition.

cleanProtectPlastic.title: Clean & Protect Plastic & Vinyl
cleanProtectPlastic.description: Revitalize and protect your plastic and vinyl surfaces with our Clean & Protect Service, ensuring longevity.

cleanDoorJambs.title: Clean Door Jambs
cleanDoorJambs.description: Our Clean Door Jambs Service removes dirt and grime, enhancing your vehicle's appearance and protection.

cleanWindowsMirrors.title: Clean Windows & Mirrors
cleanWindowsMirrors.description: Our Clean Windows & Mirrors Service leaves your glass crystal clear, enhancing visibility and overall shine.

detailFloorMats.title: Detail Floor Mats
detailFloorMats.description: Our Detail Floor Mats Service thoroughly cleans and revitalizes mats, ensuring a fresh and tidy interior.

leatherConditioning.title: Leather Conditioning Treatment
leatherConditioning.description: Our Leather Conditioning Treatment nourishes and protects your leather, preventing cracks and enhancing its appearance.

airFreshener.title: Air Freshener Treatment
airFreshener.description: Our Air Freshener Treatment eliminates odors and leaves your space smelling fresh and inviting.

detailTrunk.title: Detail Trunk
detailTrunk.description: Our Detail Trunk Service thoroughly cleans and organizes your trunk, removing debris and ensuring a neat, functional space for your belongings.

shampooCarpets.title: Shampoo Carpets
shampooCarpets.description: Our Shampoo Carpets Service deep cleans and refreshes your carpets, removing stains and odors for a revitalized look.

shampooSeats.title: Shampoo Seats
shampooSeats.description: Our Shampoo Seats Service thoroughly cleans and revitalizes your seats, removing stains and odors for a fresh interior.

exteriorServicesPage.heroTitle: Professional Exterior Care for Your Vehicle
exteriorServicesPage.introTitle: Expert Exterior Detailing For a Showroom Shine
exteriorServicesPage.introDescription: Our Professional Exterior Detail package is designed to restore and protect your vehicle's exterior, bringing back that showroom shine. This comprehensive service focuses on cleaning, decontaminating, and protecting all exterior surfaces, ensuring your vehicle looks stunning and stays protected from the elements.
exteriorServicesPage.ctaTitle: Ready to Restore Your Vehicle's Shine?
exteriorServicesPage.ctaText: Contact us today for a professional exterior detailing service.

handWash.title: Hand Wash & Dry
handWash.description: Our premium hand wash service uses pH-balanced soaps and microfiber towels to safely clean your vehicle without causing swirl marks.

clayBar.title: Clay Bar Treatment
clayBar.description: Remove embedded contaminants from your paint surface with our professional clay bar treatment, leaving a smooth finish.

paintDecontamination.title: Paint Decontamination
paintDecontamination.description: Our iron and tar removal process eliminates industrial fallout and road contaminants that regular washing can't remove.

polishWax.title: Polish & Wax
polishWax.description: Enhance your paint's gloss and protect it with our professional polishing and waxing service for lasting shine.

wheelCleaning.title: Wheel & Tire Detailing
wheelCleaning.description: Deep clean your wheels, remove brake dust, and dress your tires for a complete, polished look.

trimRestoration.title: Trim Restoration
trimRestoration.description: Restore faded plastic and rubber trim to its original black finish with our specialized restoration treatment.

glassCoating.title: Glass Coating
glassCoating.description: Apply hydrophobic coating to your windshield and windows for improved visibility in rain and easier cleaning.

paintProtection.title: Paint Protection
paintProtection.description: Protect your investment with our paint sealant or ceramic coating options for long-lasting protection.

headlightRestoration.title: Headlight Restoration
headlightRestoration.description: Restore cloudy, yellowed headlights to crystal clear condition, improving both appearance and nighttime visibility.

engineBayDetail.title: Engine Bay Detail
engineBayDetail.description: Clean and dress your engine bay for a like-new appearance while protecting electrical components.

tireShine.title: Tire Dressing
tireShine.description: Apply professional tire dressing for a rich, dark finish that enhances your vehicle's overall appearance.

chromePlating.title: Chrome & Metal Polish
chromePlating.description: Polish chrome bumpers, exhaust tips, and metal trim to a brilliant, reflective shine.

ceramicCoatingServicesPage.introTitle: The Ultimate Protection for Your Vehicle
ceramicCoatingServicesPage.introDescription: Our professional-grade ceramic coating creates an incredibly durable layer of protection that bonds with your vehicle's paint. This advanced nanotechnology provides years of protection against UV rays, chemical stains, and environmental contaminants while maintaining an incredible depth of gloss.
ceramicCoatingServicesPage.ctaText: Contact us today for a professional ceramic coating consultation.

hydrophobic.title: Hydrophobic Properties
hydrophobic.description: Water beads and sheets off the surface, making washing easier and keeping your car cleaner longer.

uvProtection.title: UV Protection
uvProtection.description: Shields your paint from harmful UV rays that cause fading and oxidation over time.

scratchResistance.title: Scratch Resistance
scratchResistance.description: Adds a hard protective layer that helps resist minor scratches and swirl marks.

chemicalResistance.title: Chemical Resistance
chemicalResistance.description: Protects against bird droppings, tree sap, acid rain, and other environmental contaminants.

easyMaintenance.title: Easy Maintenance
easyMaintenance.description: Reduces the need for frequent washing and makes cleaning quicker and easier.

glossEnhancement.title: Enhanced Gloss
glossEnhancement.description: Creates an incredibly deep, glossy finish that makes your paint look better than new.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our auto detailing services
faqPage.ctaText: Contact us directly and we'll be happy to help.

general.title: General Questions
general.a1: Auto detailing is a thorough cleaning and restoration process that goes far beyond a regular car wash. It includes deep cleaning, polishing, and protecting both the interior and exterior surfaces of your vehicle to restore it to like-new condition.
general.q2: How long does a detail take?
general.a2: Service times vary depending on the package chosen and your vehicle's condition. A basic detail typically takes 2-3 hours, while a full detail with paint correction can take 6-8 hours or more.
general.a3: Yes! We offer mobile detailing services throughout the Reno-Sparks area. We come to your home or workplace with all the necessary equipment and supplies.
general.a4: We serve the greater Reno-Sparks area including Reno, Sparks, Sun Valley, Spanish Springs, and surrounding communities in Northern Nevada.

services.title: Services & Packages
services.q1: What's included in an interior detail?
services.a1: Our interior detail includes vacuuming, steam cleaning, surface wipe-down, leather conditioning, window cleaning, floor mat cleaning, and air freshener treatment. Additional services like stain removal are available.
services.q2: What's included in an exterior detail?
services.a2: Our exterior detail includes hand wash, clay bar treatment, paint decontamination, polish, wax or sealant, wheel and tire cleaning, trim restoration, and glass treatment.
services.a3: Ceramic coating is a liquid polymer that chemically bonds with your vehicle's paint to create a protective layer. It provides superior protection against UV rays, chemicals, and contaminants while creating an incredible glossy finish.
services.q4: How long does ceramic coating last?
services.a4: Our ceramic coating packages offer protection ranging from 2 to 10 years depending on the package chosen. With proper maintenance, the coating will maintain its hydrophobic properties and protection.

pricing.title: Pricing & Payment
pricing.a1: Our packages start at $195 for a basic detail. Pricing varies based on vehicle size, condition, and services requested. Contact us for a personalized quote.
pricing.a2: Yes! We offer bundle discounts when you combine services. Currently, get 50% off a full interior detail when selecting any ceramic coating package.
pricing.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.a3: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, cash, and mobile payments including Apple Pay and Google Pay.

booking.title: Booking & Appointments
booking.q1: How do I book an appointment?
booking.a1: You can book online through our website, call us directly at (775) 440-5342, or send us a message through our contact form. We'll confirm your appointment via SMS or email.
booking.a2: We ask for 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling. This allows us to offer the time slot to other customers.
booking.q3: Do I need to prepare my vehicle?
booking.a3: Please remove personal belongings from your vehicle before your appointment. This helps us work more efficiently and protects your items during the cleaning process.
